description: Our Basic Life Support (BLS) ambulances are fully equipped and staffed by two highly trained Emergency Medical Technicians (EMT's). CARE provides ambulance service 7-days a week, 24-hours per day throughout Orange, Los Angeles, and Riverside Counties.

Care Ambulance has expanded our service capabilities by adding Advanced Life Support / Paramedic Services in the Los Angeles County area. These resources are utilized for ALS/Paramedic level interfacility transport services. Our vehicles are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, allowing us to transport the critical patient in a mobile hospital setting.

When a patient in critical condition needs to be transferred from one facility to another, that patient needs a higher level of transport service. This service is known as a Critical Care Transport or CCT level of service. All of our Critical Care Transport Nurses are full-time Care employees and are staffed on the ambulance to provide the fastest possible response times.
Care Ambulance Service is a Community Oriented service provider. We have been actively participating in and giving back to the communities we serve since 1969.
When you need the safety and security of a non-emergency ambulance transport but do not meet the medical necessity standards that your insurance provider mandates, what are the alternatives?
In Modern Ambulance service, We will provice air ambulance service for long destination or International flight. Our air service are available in all the Country of Europ and America.
We are arrange a counceling program for every month that is called Health Online Counceling. In this programme a specialist doctor will discuss how we can keep healthy our budy and mind.
